title: Italian contribution to the 2023 ICRC Special Appeal on “Disability and Mine Action” - Somalia component.
description: The initiative aims to contribute to the implementation of projects under the ICRC 2023 Special Appeal on "Disability and Mine Action" in four different beneficiary countries, namely Afghanistan - Mali - Somalia and, Sudan through specialized health care and socio-economic inclusion activities for people with disabilities, especially victims of landmines and other unexploded ordnance.
